title: Nha Trang Seaside Indulgence with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Discover tranquillity and modern luxury at this seaside oasis perched along Vietnam's eastern coastline. Spend your days unwinding with refreshing dips in the waterfront infinity pools or lounging on the manmade beach, all while soaking in sweeping views of the glistening South China Sea.

Satisfy your taste buds with the vibrant seafood dishes Nha Trang is known for at Boma Beach Club, and indulge in soothing treatments at the onsite spa. Little adventurers will be entertained with daily activities at the Kids' Club, leaving you free to truly relax.

And when you're ready to explore, the bustling Dam Market with its ocean-fresh seafood, and the historic Po Nagar Cham Towers are just moments away.
offer_address: 4 Duong De Street, Vinh Hoa Ward, Nha Trang 650000, Vietnam

title: Ultimate Vietnam Holiday: Island Escape + Five-Star City Stopover
description: Treat yourself to the ultimate Vietnam city to beach getaway, and go from two nights at the five-star Sofitel Saigon Plaza Hotel in Ho Chi Minh City to a private island oasis off Vietnam’s south coast with an extended stay at the Vinpearl Luxury Nha Trang - a beachfront oasis located on the paradise island of Hon Tre, one of Nha Trang's most beautiful private islands. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner, two daily cocktails to share, four massages to share, land and sea transfers and a cooking class at Vinpearl Luxury Nha Trang plus more at Sofitel Saigon Plaza Hotel.
offer_address: Hon Tre Island, Vinh Nguyen Ward, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

title: High-End Private Beach Escape in Vietnam with Daily Dining
description: Escape to Vietnam’s beach capital, Nha Trang, famous for its breathtaking stretches of white sand and clear sapphire waters. Experience a spectacular oasis perched on a natural lagoon at the multi-award-winning Amiana Resort Nha Trang, featuring a 2,500sqm seawater infinity pool and private beach - with daily breakfast, your choice of daily lunch or decadent dinner (including one romantic dinner for two), nightly sunset cocktails, return airport transfers, spa treatments and more.
offer_address: Phạm Văn Đồng, Vĩnh Hải, Thành phố Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

title: Vietnam Splendour in the Heart of Nha Trang with Two Set-Menu Dinners, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Discover a blend of old-world Vietnamese opulence, touches of striking Indochine style and modern luxury at the five-star Potique Hotel. Positioned among Nha Trang's dazzling array of world-class marketplaces, restaurants and nightlife, and only one block from the emerald waters of Nha Trang Bay, this hotel is the perfect base to discover Vietnam's golden beaches, unforgettable diving spots and idyllic offshore islands. Whether it's laidback beachside bliss or unforgettable evenings, Potique Hotel guarantees you'll enjoy the best of both worlds.

Head to the rooftop Blue Bar and enjoy panoramic views of the city and the ocean beyond alongside a refreshing local beer, visit Nha Trang Restaurant for indulgent Vietnamese fare or treat yourself to fresh ingredients and unique cooking styles at Indochine Restaurant. Spend afternoons splashing in the iridescent infinity pool or experience Nha Trang's countless treasures, including the nearby Agarwood Tower and Khanh Hoa Museum.
offer_address: 22 Hung Vuong Street, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province 57106, Vietnam

title: Dreamy Vietnam Novotel Stay on Idyllic Nha Trang Bay with Daily Buffet Breakfast
description: Uncover Vietnam’s humble beauty at the idyllic Novotel Nha Trang. Coveted as one of the world's most beautiful bays, Nha Trang boasts a privileged location, endowed with striking mountain ranges and deep warm waters nuzzled by native flora. Here, happy hour is all night long, with hundreds of restaurants and bars serving up icy cocktails and ocean-fresh seafood. Admire the crimson sunset from the hotel’s outdoor pool, be revitalised at the exclusive onsite spa, or embark on an expedition across crystal-clear waters and snorkel along the flourishing coral reef.
offer_address: 50 Tran Phu Street, Nha Trang City 652076, Khanh Hoa, Vietnam

title: High-End Private Beach Escape in Vietnam
description: Escape to Vietnam’s beach capital, Nha Trang, famous for its breathtaking stretches of white sand and clear sapphire waters. Experience a spectacular oasis perched on a natural lagoon at the multi award-winning Amiana Nha Trang featuring a 2,500sqm seawater infinity pool and private beach - with daily breakfast, five decadent dinners, nightly sunset cocktails, return airport transfers, spa treatments and more.
offer_address: Turtle Bay, Phạm Văn Đồng, Nha Trang, Việt Nam

title: Five-Star Beachfront Oasis with Decadent Dining Experiences
description: Experience the best of both worlds at The Anam - a secluded, five-star haven perched on a striking private beach in Cam Ranh - just 30 minutes’ drive from bustling Nha Trang. A seven or nine-night stay at this sophisticated beachside oasis is sure to relax and rejuvenate. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, three unique dining experiences, nightly sunset free-flow drinks, two-hour spa experience, return airport transfers and more. Plus, two children (11 years and under) stay free with most inclusions!
offer_address: Nguyen Tat Thanh, Cam Lam, Nha Trang, Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam

title: Extended by Popular Demand: Central Nha Trang Splendour with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Transfers
description:
Discover a blend of old-world Vietnamese opulence, touches of striking Indochine style and modern luxury at this five-star sanctuary. Among Nha Trang's dazzling array of world-class marketplaces, restaurants and nightlife, just a block from the emerald waters of Nha Trang Bay, this hotel is the perfect base to explore Vietnam's golden beaches, diving spots and idyllic offshore islands.

Whether it's laid-back beachside bliss or unforgettable evenings, Potique Hotel promises the best of both worlds. Enjoy panoramic views while sipping a refreshing local beer at the rooftop Blue Bar, visit Nha Trang Restaurant for indulgent Vietnamese fare or indulge in fresh ingredients and unique cooking styles at Indochine Restaurant.

Spend your afternoons splashing in the iridescent infinity pool or experiencing Nha Trang's countless treasures, including the nearby Agarwood Tower and Khanh Hoa Museum.
offer_address: 22 Hung Vuong Street, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province 57106, Vietnam

title: Three-Bedroom Villa Stay in Secluded Beachfront Oasis
description: Escape to a tropical paradise in your very own, palatial three-bedroom private pool villa (for up to six people) at The Anam Nha Trang - a sophisticated beachside resort overlooking a 300-metre white-sand private beach. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, two dinners for the whole group, two 60-minute massages per person, daily free-flow cocktail hour at the beach, return airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Lot 3 Nguyen Thanh Tat Boulevard, Cam Hải Đông, Cam Lâm, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

title: Vietnam: Central Nha Trang Splendour with Guaranteed Suite Upgrade, Nightly Rooftop Cocktails & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover a blend of old-world Vietnam razzle-dazzle, with touches of striking Indochine style and full-blown modern luxury, at the five-star Potique Hotel. Positioned among Nha Trang's array of world-class marketplaces, restaurants and nightlife, and only one block from the emerald waters of Nha Trang Bay, this hotel is the perfect base to discover Vietnam's golden beaches, unforgettable diving spots and idyllic offshore islands. Whether it's laidback beachside bliss by day or unforgettable evenings, Potique Hotel guarantees you and your special someone will enjoy the best of both worlds.

Head to the rooftop infinity pool and poolside Blue Bar to enjoy panoramic views of the city and the ocean alongside a refreshing local beer, visit Nha Trang Restaurant for indulgent Vietnamese fare or treat yourself to fresh ingredients and unique cooking styles at Indochine Restaurant. Spend afternoons indulging in restorative treatments at Sen Spa or experiencing Nha Trang's countless treasures, including the nearby Agarwood Tower and Khanh Hoa Museum.
offer_address: 22 Hung Vuong Street, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province 57106, Vietnam

vendor_name: Villa Le Corail, A Gran Melia Hotel
title: Nha Trang Mediterranean-Inspired Oceanfront Opulence with Daily Breakfast, Dinner, Cocktails & Massages
description:
Welcome to Vietnam's first and only Gran Meliá resort. One of only 19 outposts globally, this distinguished Spanish brand can only be found at the world’s most dramatically beautiful landmarks. Set along the pristine Khanh Hoa coastline in Nha Trang, it offers breathtaking views of Turtle Island and endless blue horizons - best explored by the resort's glass kayaks, paddleboards and exceptional catamaran voyages.

Guests are treated to a curated schedule of complimentary activities, including pilates, yoga, art workshops and sound healing sessions. Dining is a standout, featuring Vietnam’s only outpost of Michelin chef Marcos Moran’s acclaimed Spanish fine-dining restaurant, Hispania, all-day panoramic view eatery Natura and Japanese fine dining Shibui, serving Omakase with an expertly chosen wine list.

In true Gran Meliá style, the resort’s onsite wellness retreat, Song Spa, is dressed to impress: a carefully curated menu of wellness treatments, Turkish baths and seaside yoga classes make it the perfect place to savour days spent in paradise.
offer_address: Bai Tien, Duong De, Vinh Hoa Ward, Nha Trang 650000, Vietnam

title: Three Bedroom Villa Beachfront Bliss
description: Escape to a tropical paradise in your very own palatial three-bedroom private pool villa (for up to six people) at The Anam Nha Trang - a sophisticated beachside resort overlooking a 300-metre white-sand private beach. Enjoy daily breakfast, two blissful 60-minutes massages per person, two dinners, a nightly hour of unlimited sunset cocktails and canapes, return airport transfers and free access to The Anam's Kids Club for kids aged 12 and under.
offer_address: Lot 3, Nguyen Thanh Tat Boulevard, Cam Lâm, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

vendor_name: Villa Le Corail, A Gran Melia Hotel
title: Grand Opening: Nha Trang Spanish-Inspired Oceanfront Opulence with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails, Two Dinners & Massages
description:
Be one of the first to savour Spanish-inspired seaside luxury steeped in Vietnamese charm with a stay at Gran Meliá Nha Trang, offering breathtaking views over Turtle Island and the shimmering blue beyond. Gran Meliá’s first outpost in Southeast Asia effortlessly delivers signature European-style luxury in the heart of Vietnam’s spectacular central coast, backed by a spectacular infinity pool and a world-class dining roster. The resort boasts Vietnam’s only branch of celebrated chef Marcos Moran’s acclaimed house of Spanish fine dining, Hispania, with a seafood-focused menu and top-shelf wine list to match. Plus, al fresco all-day eatery Natura matches Mediterranean-inspired Asian plates with unrestricted views over Nha Trang Bay. If sake’s more your speed, an evening at Shibui, the resort’s ultra-refined Japanese restaurant, is guaranteed to dazzle, with sushi and robata-grilled plates elevated by sizzle and smoke.

In true Gran Meliá style, the resort’s onsite wellness retreat, Song Spa, is dressed to impress: a carefully curated menu of wellness treatments, Turkish baths and seaside yoga classes make it the perfect place to savour days spent in paradise. When you're ready to explore, Nha Trang's abundance of fresh seafood restaurants, Champa-era temples and magnificent diving spots await.
offer_address: Bai Tien, Duong De, Vinh Hoa Ward, Nha Trang 650000, Vietnam

title: Vietnam Five-Star Splendour in the Heart of Nha Trang with Two Set-Menu Dinners, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Discover a blend of old-world Vietnamese opulence, touches of striking Indochine style and modern luxury at the five-star Potique Hotel. Positioned among Nha Trang's dazzling array of world-class marketplaces, restaurants and nightlife and only one block from the emerald waters of Nha Trang Bay, this hotel is the perfect base to discover Vietnam's golden beaches, unforgettable diving spots and idyllic offshore islands. Whether it's laidback beachside bliss or unforgettable evenings, Potique Hotel guarantees you'll enjoy the best of both worlds.

Head to the rooftop Blue Bar and enjoy panoramic views of the city and the ocean beyond alongside a refreshing local beer, visit Nha Trang Restaurant for indulgent Vietnamese fare or treat yourself to fresh ingredients and unique cooking styles at Indochine Restaurant. Spend afternoons splashing in the iridescent infinity pool or experience Nha Trang's countless treasures, including the nearby Agarwood Tower and Khanh Hoa Museum.
offer_address: 22 Hung Vuong Street, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province 57106, Vietnam

title: Mia Resort: The #1 Hotel in Nha Trang, Vietnam
description: Experience oceanfront tranquility at its finest with a six-night stay packed full of amazing inclusions at the Mia Resort Nha Trang, rated the #1 hotel in Nha Trang on TripAdvisor. Includes return airport transfers, daily breakfasts, spa treatments, sunset cocktails, themed dinners, daily afternoon tea, a cooking class, a Vietnamese coffee tasting, a Winking Seal Saigon craft beer tasting and much more.
offer_address: Bai Dong, Cam Hải Đông, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

title: Tranquil Nha Trang Escape on Private Beach with Spa & Seven Onsite Dining Venues
description: Indulge in the serenity of Vietnam's coastal paradise in a quiet cove of pearlescent sands and turquoise waters at this tranquil retreat. Tucked away on its own private beach, this oasis of calm is the perfect space to unwind - cool off in a sprawling pool, rejuvenate at Akoya spa or practice your serve at the tennis courts. Enjoy some of the finest Vietnamese cuisine at Lotus Restaurant, or simply watch the sun dip below the horizon with a delicious cocktail at the Beach Comber Bar.
offer_address: Hon Tre Nha Trang City, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 65000, Vietnam

vendor_name: Vinpearl Resort & Spa Nha Trang Bay
title: Relaxing Nha Trang Beachfront Escape with Amusement Park & Golf Course
description:
Experience the magic of Vietnam's coastal city with a stay at this opulent five-star resort, nestled on the powder-white sands of Nha Trang Bay. 

Enjoy a feast of local flavours at one of three onsite restaurants and bars, or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the world-class spa. Explore the surrounding area, with the historic Po Nagar Cham Towers and the vibrant Dam Market within easy reach, or dive into the crystal-clear waters of Nha Trang Bay for a snorkelling adventure. Make your way around the 18-hole golf course while the kids are entertained at the kids' club, or make it a fun family day out with a visit to nearby VinWonders Nha Trang amusement park.
location_description: Vinpearl Resort & Spa Nha Trang Bay
offer_address: Hon Tre Island, Vinh Nguyen Ward, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province, 650000, Vietnam

title: Top-Rated Five-Star Vietnam Hotel with Rooftop Bar
description: Step into a world of sophisticated beauty when you enter the elegant lobby of Vietnam's five-star Potique Nha Trang. Take the time to discover the sun-kissed lifestyle of this thriving coastal paradise, plush with turquoise beaches and cosmopolitan dining options. Then, indulge in a bespoke spa treatment at the onsite Sen Spa, enjoy a cocktail on the rooftop Blue Bar and dine on local cuisine at the romantic Indochine Restaurant.
offer_address: 22 Hung Vuong Street, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa Province 57106, Vietnam

title: Nha Trang Coastal Bliss with Three Swimming Pools
description: The buzzing beach town of Nha Trang offers the perfect combination of city living and coastal charms and is best enjoyed from the stylish InterContinental Nha Trang, an IHG Hotel. Enjoy superb views of the city's bay from this hotel, then visit the four bars and restaurants, including a poolside bar. Fill your days however you please: dive into one of three outdoor swimming pools or head to the day spa for a spot of pampering and unwinding.
location_description: InterContinental Nha Trang, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 34 Tran Phu, Loc Tho, Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa 300202, Vietnam

title: Beachfront Nha Trang Apartment-Style Escape with Onsite Spa & Pool Bar
description: Experience southern Vietnam's vibrant coast at this apartment-style escape on the white sandy shores of Nha Trang Bay. Feel at home against panoramic ocean views and relish authentic Vietnamese cuisine and fresh seafood along the Tran Phu Street Promenade at your doorstep. Unwind with drink in hand at the hotel's infinity pool - perfect for watching the sunset - or head to the onsite Vincharm Spa for some well-earned pampering.
offer_address: 78-80 Tran Phu Street, Loc Tho Ward, Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa 650000, Vietnam

vendor_name: InterContinental Residences Nha Trang (formally Costa Executive Residences)
title: Five-Star Vietnam Self-Catering Apartments Overlooking Nha Trang Bay
description: Shouldered by mountain ranges and sitting above the sparkling bay, InterContinental Residences Nha Trang is the perfect base for exploring Nha Trang. Cool off under the Vietnam sun on the pool deck, dipping in and out of the glistening pool, or take a leisurely walk to the nearby beach and soak up Nha Trang Bay vistas. Taste ocean-fresh seafood at nearby restaurants and stretch your muscles at the fitness centre, all on your doorstep.
offer_address: 32 Tran Phu Street, Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa, Vietnam, 650000

title: Hon Tre Island Beachfront Pool Villa Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Overwater Bar & Day Spa
description: Discover the allure of Nha Trang Bay's sparkling coastline in a bespoke private pool villa on Hon Tre Island, surrounded by verdant tropical gardens. Offering direct access to a private white-sand beach, the resort lets you enjoy this resort city's azure tropical waters in five-star luxury. Spend days basking in warm weather and savour local and international delicacies across five restaurants and bars, then rejuvenate your senses at the open-air Akoya Spa hut and sip sunset cocktails at overwater Wave Bar.
offer_address: Hon Tre Island, Vinh Nguyen Ward, Nha Trang City, Khanh Hoa 650000, Vietnam

title: Secluded Five-Star Vietnam Beachfront Luxury
description:
Discover five-star beachfront bliss among the waves of Vietnam’s East Sea at Mia Resort Nha Trang, ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Sitting on a secluded private beach, nestled in the cliffs between Nha Trang and Cam Ranh, this remarkable resort delivers the ultimate in private luxury, with everything you’ll need onsite.

Condos and villas at Mia Resort Nha Trang are designed with romance in mind, with equal amounts of indoor and outdoor space to explore. Dive into the waves of the private beach or spend your days poolside, flanked by sun loungers, palm trees and, further afield, Nha Trang's mountains. Find your zen with a morning yoga class before diving into deep relaxation at Xanh Spa, with tailormade treatments using ginger, coffee and lemongrass on offer. Try something new every night at the beachside Sandals Restaurant - weekly themed nights include pasta, seafood, Vietnamese and BBQ - or taste your way through the selection of cocktails at Mojito’s Lounge and Bar. If leaving your condo or villa seems too hard, ask the staff to pack a picnic to eat on your private terrace. Just 20 minutes from the closest international airport, Mia Resort Nha Trang is easy to access but incredibly hard to leave.
offer_address: Bai Dong, Cam Hải Đông, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

title: Beachfront Novotel Nha Trang Elegance with Tranquil Pool & Spa
description:
Bask in the coastal charms of Nha Trang from this idyllic Novotel abode, perfectly positioned on the vibrant city's main road, offering easy access to the pristine beach. Unwind in style in the hotel's well-appointed rooms and relax in the glistening pool. As the sun dips below the horizon, replenish with scrumptious cocktails at the Pool Bar. 

When it's time to explore, the historic Ponagar Temple, the Long Son Pagoda and the bustling night market are within easy reach. For beach lovers, embark on an expedition across the crystal-clear waters and snorkel in the colourful reefs. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's In Balance Spa for a rejuvenating treatment.
offer_address: 50 Trần Phú, Lộc Thọ, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 652076, Vietnam
